DataElement.preferredName: Text Encapsulation Data Restriction Media Type ISO21090.Code.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: The words of something written.:The process or condition of being enclosed.:A collection or single item of factual information, derived from measurement or research, from which conclusions may be drawn.:Anything that limits; a limitation._Any mechanism of mass communication.:Something distinguishable as an identifiable class based on common qualities._A string that is an identifier, and therefore must be either a string representation of an OID, a UUID, or a simple token taken from a lsit of controlled names for the context in which the Uid is used.
